title: Swift Pattern Matching with Tuples
content:
Swift Pattern Matching with Tuples Mon, Sep 28 Swift
TweetJordan Morgan shows several interesting examples on ways to apply pattern matching when working with Swift tuples. “Swift’s suite of pattern matching capabilities always struck me as both useful and practical. It takes something simple and empowers it be as complex as the situation calls for.” Pattern matching with Swift tuples – @JordanMorgan10
